mapper.insert:
insert into JxlTable(id, serial_no, cloum0, cloum1, cloum2, cloum3, cloum4, cloum5, cloum6, cloum7, cloum8, cloum9, cloum10, cloum11)
select createmaxno('jxlTableId', to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMdd'), '0', 20) gzbId, #{jxlTable.serialNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jxlTable.cloum0, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jxlTable.cloum1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jxlTable.cloum2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jxlTable.cloum3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jxlTable.cloum4, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jxlTable.cloum5, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jxlTable.cloum6, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jxlTable.cloum7, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jxlTable.cloum8, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jxlTable.cloum9, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jxlTable.cloum10, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jxlTable.cloum11, jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
